# Differential cross section for electron-argon scattering

# Data from 0.136 to 1.424 eV:
# Arati Dasgupta and A. K. Bhatia, Scattering of electrons from argon atoms,
# PHYSICAL REVIEW A, VOLUME 32, NUMBER 6 (1985)

# Data from 3 to 300 eV:
# Sultana N. Nahar and J. M. Wadehra, Elastic scattering of
# positrons and electrons by argon, PHYSICAL REVIEW A, VOLUME 35, NUMBER 5 (1987)

# Dimension of matrix:
# dimX
20
# dimY
38

# Data: First line is the energy, the first column the angle
# Negative values are ignored. Therefore -1 is used as place holder if no 
# data for this energy/angle combination exists.
# The column for the zero energy is the same one like the column for 0.136 eV. It shouldn't 
# have an important impact, cause we are interested in data for much more energy.
# The first element doesn't matter...
42	0	0.136	0.306	0.544	1.424	3	5	10	15	20	30	40	50	75	100	150	200	250	300
